Common.contactsUnavailable: Sorry, contact information is not available at the moment. Please try again later.
Common.name: Name

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Flowia

accountCreation.question: How can I create an account?
accountCreation.answer: You can create your account by clicking on the "Create your account" link in the main section or by visiting the registration page. The process is simple and fast, taking only a few minutes to complete the registration.

freePlan.question: Is Quevo free?
freePlan.answer: Yes, we offer a free plan that allows you to try the basic features. You can also try Quevo Premium for free for one month with no commitment. The free plan includes all essential features to get started with service management and basic AI features.

serviceBoards.question: What are Service Boards and how do they work?
serviceBoards.answer: Service Boards are our core feature that provides a unified, transparent view of your service process for both you and your customers. They allow you to manage complex, multi-step services with predefined actions, real-time updates, and secure access. Customers can see exactly what's happening, what's been done, and what comes next.

aiFeatures.question: What AI-powered features does Quevo offer?
aiFeatures.answer: Quevo includes AI-powered social media content generation, email marketing assistance, quotation generation, support ticket classification, and smart response suggestions. Our AI helps automate content creation, improve customer communication, and streamline your business operations.

appointmentScheduling.question: How does the appointment scheduling system work?
appointmentScheduling.answer: Our appointment scheduling system allows customers to book appointments online through your business profile. You can set available time slots, manage your calendar, and customers receive automatic confirmations. The system integrates seamlessly with Service Boards for complete service management.

dataSecurity.question: Is my data secure?
dataSecurity.answer: Absolutely yes. We use the most advanced security technologies to protect your data and that of your customers. All information is encrypted and we strictly comply with privacy regulations, including GDPR. Service Boards also offer optional password protection for sensitive services.

customerSupport.question: How can I contact customer support?
customerSupport.answer: Our support team is available 24/7 through email, live chat, and phone. We offer multi-language support in 15+ languages including English, Spanish, French, German, and Italian. We respond within hours and are always ready to help you with any questions or technical issues.

multiLanguage.question: Does Quevo support multiple languages?
multiLanguage.answer: Yes, Quevo natively supports 5 languages: Italian, English, Spanish, German, and French. All features, including Service Boards, AI content generation, and customer support, are available in multiple languages. You can easily switch between languages in your account settings.

pricing.question: What are the costs of premium plans?
pricing.answer: Our premium plans start from €29/month and include advanced features such as unlimited Service Boards, AI-powered marketing tools, priority support, advanced analytics, and custom integrations. We also offer discounts for annual payments and custom plans for large companies.

technicalRequirements.question: What are the technical requirements?
technicalRequirements.answer: Quevo works on any device with a modern web browser. No complex software installations are required. Service Boards are mobile-optimized, and customers can access them via QR codes or direct links. The system is optimized to work even with slow internet connections.

HowPoints.subtitle: Get your professional business website up and running in just a few simple steps.

Actions.title: Powerful Features for Your Business
Actions.subtitle: Everything you need to create a professional online presence and grow your business.

Board.title: Clear and seamless communication, transforming complex processes into clear, guided experiences.

Benefits.effortlessManagementDescription: From one dashboard, send payment requests, schedule appointments, request info, or share documents. Simplify every interaction.
Benefits.automatedNotificationsDescription: Keep customers informed. Key updates trigger instant email alerts, no manual effort needed.
Benefits.secureAccessDescription: Unique, secure links for every service. Share effortlessly, with optional password protection.
Benefits.unifiedViewDescription: Customers see exactly what's needed and the current service status at a glance. No more confusion, just clarity.
Benefits.problemSolvingDescription: End miscommunications and disputes. A shared, chronological record keeps everyone aligned.
Benefits.mobileReadyDescription: Access and manage on any device. Your customers get a smooth experience, wherever they are.

Hero.title: AI-Powered Customer Experience and Marketing Platform That Grows With You
Hero.subtitle: Simplify complex service interactions and amplify your marketing with intelligent automation. From customer guidance and support to AI-generated content and evolving features - your business platform adapts and grows with your needs.
Hero.startFree: Start FREE. No payment details required.

promotions.description: Create irresistible offers. Drive sales and engage your audience.

Board.title: Clear and seamless communication, transforming complex processes into clear, guided experiences.
Board.description: Service Boards are designed to simplify the management of complex, multi-step services that require ongoing customer interaction, updates, appointments, and payments. The Service Board is versatile, allowing businesses to tailor it to their unique workflow.

unifiedView.title: A Central Point Accessible Everywhere
unifiedView.description: A central point for the entire service process, viewable and manageable from any device. No scattered messages or emails.

clearView.title: Clear and Complete Vision
clearView.description: Customers see exactly the current service status, what has already happened, what needs to be done and what comes next. Every process becomes a clear and transparent service.

effortlessManagement.title: Effortless and Versatile Management
effortlessManagement.description: Versatile generic actions and predefined actions to quickly add payment requests, schedule appointments, provide documents etc.

automatedNotifications.title: Automated Notifications
automatedNotifications.description: Keep customers informed. Key updates trigger instant email alerts, no manual effort needed.

secureAccess.title: Reserved & Secure Access
secureAccess.description: Unique, secure links for every service. Share effortlessly, with optional password protection.

problemSolving.title: Support Tickets & Complete History
problemSolving.description: Customers request support through tickets from the board. Shared chronological event history and immediate access to all records for quick problem resolution.

Steps.title: How It Works
Steps.subtitle: Get your professional business website up and running in just a few simple steps.

requirementsConsents.title: Requirements, Consents and Details
requirementsConsents.description: Requirements or consents to confirm, Mandatory information to provide

Categories.title: Designed for many types of activities
Categories.subtitle: You can use it in various ways and there's always a free plan. Discover how Flowia can simplify your customers' experience, help you build their loyalty and receive valuable feedback directly from them.

accountCreation.question: How can I create an account?
accountCreation.answer: You can create your account by clicking the "Create your account" link in the main section or visiting the registration page. The process is simple and fast, it only takes a few minutes to complete the registration.

freePlan.question: Is Flowia free?
freePlan.answer: Yes, we offer a free plan that allows you to try the basic features. You can also try Flowia Premium for free for one month with no commitment. The free plan includes all essential features to get started.

pointsSystem.question: How does the points and rewards system work?
pointsSystem.answer: Your customers earn points every time they visit your establishment and scan their personal QR code. You can define the rewards they can redeem once they reach certain points. The system is completely customizable and allows you to create tailored loyalty programs.

mobileMenu.question: Can I manage the digital menu from my phone?
mobileMenu.answer: Absolutely yes! Your digital menu is completely customizable and can be managed comfortably from your phone or tablet, updating in real time for your customers. You can modify prices, add new dishes and manage availability from anywhere.

profileSupport.question: Do you offer support for profile creation?
profileSupport.answer: Of course! If you need help, we can create your profile, upload the menu and set up initial promotions for you. We also offer training to ensure you are autonomous in management. Our support team is always available to help you.

dataSecurity.question: Is my data secure?
dataSecurity.answer: Absolutely yes. We use the most advanced security technologies to protect your data and that of your customers. All information is encrypted and we strictly comply with privacy regulations, including GDPR.

customerSupport.question: How can I contact customer support?
customerSupport.answer: Our support team is available 24/7 via email, live chat and phone. We will respond within hours and are always ready to help you with any questions or technical problems you may have.

integration.question: Does Flowia integrate with other systems?
integration.answer: Yes, Flowia integrates perfectly with the main restaurant management systems, POS and delivery platforms. We offer open APIs and native integrations to ensure a smooth transition without disrupting your workflow.

pricing.question: What are the costs of premium plans?
pricing.answer: Our premium plans start from €29/month and include advanced features such as detailed analytics, automated marketing, priority support and advanced customizations. We also offer discounts for annual payments and custom plans for large companies.

technicalRequirements.question: What are the technical requirements?
technicalRequirements.answer: Flowia works on any device with a modern web browser. No complex software installations are required. For customers, just a smartphone with a camera to scan QR codes. The system is optimized to work even with slow internet connections.

MarketingFeatures.subtitle: Transform your marketing strategy with intelligent automation, smart content generation, and AI-driven insights

socialMedia.title: Social Media Content Creator
socialMedia.description: AI generates engaging social media posts for Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, Twitter, and TikTok. Includes posting schedules and optimal timing recommendations.

emailMarketing.title: Email Marketing Assistant
emailMarketing.description: Create targeted email campaigns with AI-generated content. Segment customers, schedule sends, and track engagement with professional email templates.

RequestFeatures.title: Request Management Features
RequestFeatures.subtitle: Streamline your service request workflow with intelligent automation and professional tools

requestManagement.title: Smart Request Management
requestManagement.description: Organize and prioritize service requests with intelligent categorization, status tracking, and automated follow-ups.

quotationGenerator.title: AI-Powered Quotation Generator
quotationGenerator.description: Pre-built quotations with customer name and selected items/extras from service requests. Everything remains fully customizable and editable before export to PDF with your business branding.

SupportFeatures.subtitle: Transform your customer support with intelligent automation, smart routing, and AI-driven insights

aiTicketClassification.title: AI Ticket Classification
aiTicketClassification.description: Automatically categorize and prioritize support tickets using machine learning. Route tickets to the right team members and set appropriate urgency levels.

smartResponseSuggestions.title: Smart Response Suggestions
smartResponseSuggestions.description: Get AI-powered response suggestions based on ticket content and customer history. Maintain consistent, professional communication across all support channels.

textCorrection.title: Text Correction & Enhancement
textCorrection.description: AI automatically corrects grammar, spelling, and formatting in customer messages to make them easier to read and understand. Improves communication clarity.

knowledgeBase.title: Comprehensive Knowledge Base
knowledgeBase.description: Access to detailed documentation, video tutorials, and step-by-step guides. Self-service resources for common questions.

premiumSupport.title: 24/7 Premium Support
premiumSupport.description: Round-the-clock assistance for Pro and Enterprise plans. Get help whenever you need it, no matter your timezone.

multiLanguage.title: Multi-Language Support
multiLanguage.description: Get support in your native language. Our team speaks 15+ languages including English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, and more.

fastResponse.title: Fast Response
fastResponse.description: Average response time under 2 hours for Pro plans, 4 hours for standard plans. Critical issues get priority handling.

multipleChannels.title: Multiple Support Channels
multipleChannels.description: Choose your preferred way to get help: live chat, email, phone, or video calls. We adapt to your communication style.

testimonials.title: What Our Customers Say
testimonials.subtitle: Don't just take our word for it - hear from businesses that trust our support

CTA.subtitle: Join thousands of businesses already using AI to streamline their operations and boost productivity

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us
Privacy.description: This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal data in accordance with GDPR and Italian law.

notice.title: EU/Italian Data Protection Compliance
notice.content: We are committed to protecting your personal data in compliance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR - EU Regulation 2016/679) and Italian Data Protection Code (D.Lgs. 196/2003 as amended).

gdprCompliance.title: GDPR & Italian Law Compliant
gdprCompliance.description: Fully compliant with GDPR (EU Regulation 2016/679) and Italian Data Protection Code (D.Lgs. 196/2003). Your data is protected under the strictest privacy laws in the world.

dataMinimization.title: Data Minimization
dataMinimization.description: We collect only the minimum data necessary for each feature. AI features limited to 100 characters, structured forms with only required fields.

aiProtection.title: AI Privacy Protection
aiProtection.description: We NEVER send personal data (customer names, emails, phone numbers) to AI services. Only business context and anonymous service details are shared.

euStorage.title: EU Data Storage
euStorage.description: File storage can be configured for EU-only locations. We use Cloudflare R2 with European data centers available.

encryption.title: End-to-End Security
encryption.description: All data encrypted in transit (HTTPS/TLS). Passwords hashed with bcrypt. Private files protected with time-limited signed URLs.

transparency.title: Full Transparency
transparency.description: Complete disclosure of all data processing activities, third-party providers, and international transfers with safeguards.

yourControl.title: You're in Control
yourControl.description: Exercise all GDPR rights: access, delete, export, correct your data. 30-day response time guaranteed.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content:
Welcome to our Privacy Policy. This document explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal data when you use our SaaS platform. We are committed to transparency and protecting your privacy rights under EU and Italian law.

By using our services, you acknowledge that you have read and understood this Privacy Policy.

controller.title: 2. Data Controller
controller.content:
Company Name: [WORK IN PROGRESS]

Registered Office: [WORK IN PROGRESS]

VAT Number: [WORK IN PROGRESS]

Email: privacy@example.com [WORK IN PROGRESS]

Data Protection Officer (DPO): [If applicable - WORK IN PROGRESS]

dataCollected.title: 3. Data We Collect
dataCollected.content:
We collect the following categories of personal data to provide and improve our services:

User Registration Data:

  • Identity information: First name, last name, email address
  • Demographic data: Birth date, birth country, gender (optional)
  • Location data: Country, region, city, address
  • Account credentials: Email and hashed password
  • Phone number (optional)

Business Information (for Business Accounts):

  • Business details: Company name, business name, description
  • Legal information: VAT number, company address
  • Contact information: Business email and phone numbers
  • Profile images and cover photos

Service Usage Data:

  • Service requests and quotations you submit
  • Appointments you schedule
  • Documents and files you upload
  • Support tickets and communications
  • Preferences and settings

Payment Information (processed by Stripe):

  • Payment method metadata (card brand, last 4 digits)
  • Billing address
  • Subscription plan and status
  • Transaction history
  • Note: Full payment card details are handled exclusively by Stripe and never stored on our servers

AI Interaction Data (with Privacy Protection):

  • Messages you send to our AI chatbot (limited to 100 characters)
  • Conversation history and context
  • AI-generated responses
  • Session identifiers
  • Note: We collect this data only with your consent and for providing AI services
  • Important: We NEVER share customer personal data with AI providers - only anonymized service descriptions and business context

Technical and Usage Data:

  • IP address (for security and rate limiting)
  • Browser type and version
  • Device information
  • Pages visited and features used
  • Timestamps of activities
  • User agent strings
  • Error logs and performance data

Marketing Communications Data (with consent):

  • Email address for newsletters
  • Communication preferences
  • Marketing campaign engagement

Data from End Customers (B2B2C):

When businesses using our platform collect data from their customers, we process:

  • Customer names and contact information
  • Service request details
  • Appointment information
  • Documents provided by customers
  • Consent records (newsletter, privacy policy)

Note: Businesses using our platform are independent data controllers for their customer data and must have their own privacy policies.

purposes.title: 4. Purposes of Processing
purposes.content:
We process your personal data for the following purposes:

  • Service Delivery: To provide you with access to our platform and its features
  • Account Management: To create and maintain your account
  • Payment Processing: To process subscription payments and invoices
  • Customer Support: To respond to your inquiries and provide technical assistance
  • Service Improvement: To analyze usage patterns and improve our platform
  • AI Features: To provide AI-powered assistance and content generation (with your consent)
  • Marketing Communications: To send you updates and promotional materials (with your consent)
  • Legal Compliance: To comply with legal obligations such as tax and accounting requirements

legalBasis.title: 5. Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.content:
We process your personal data based on the following legal grounds:

  • Contract Performance: Processing necessary to fulfill our contract with you (GDPR Art. 6(1)(b))
  • Consent: For AI features, marketing communications, and optional services (GDPR Art. 6(1)(a))
  • Legitimate Interest: For fraud prevention, security, and service improvement (GDPR Art. 6(1)(f))
  • Legal Obligation: For tax, accounting, and other legal requirements (GDPR Art. 6(1)(c))

thirdParties.title: 6. Third-Party Service Providers
thirdParties.content:
We work with trusted third-party service providers to deliver our services. Each provider has been carefully selected and is contractually bound to protect your data through Data Processing Agreements (DPAs).

Why We Use Third-Party Providers:

  • To provide secure and reliable services
  • To leverage specialized expertise (payment processing, AI, cloud storage)
  • To ensure platform performance and availability
  • To offer advanced features that enhance your experience

Our Third-Party Service Providers:

Below is a complete list of third-party processors we use, what data they process, where they are located, and what safeguards are in place.

Primary Infrastructure (EU-Based):

  • Supabase (Database): PostgreSQL hosted in Central Europe (Zurich, Switzerland via AWS). All user data stored in EU/EEA region with full GDPR compliance.
  • Cloudflare R2 (File Storage): Configured for EU data centers. All uploaded files stored in European Union.

Third-Party Services (with Safeguards):

internationalTransfers.title: 7. International Data Transfers
internationalTransfers.content:
Some of our service providers are located outside the European Economic Area (EEA). We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place:

  • Standard Contractual Clauses (SCCs): We use EU-approved SCCs with Stripe (USA) and OpenAI (USA)
  • Data Protection Agreements: All processors have signed comprehensive Data Processing Agreements
  • Transfer Impact Assessments: We have conducted assessments to ensure adequate protection

You have the right to obtain a copy of the safeguards we have implemented. Contact us for more information.

retention.title: 8. Data Retention
retention.content:
We retain your personal data only as long as necessary:

  • Active Accounts: Duration of your subscription plus 2 years after account closure
  • AI Conversation History: 12 months, then automatically deleted
  • Payment Records: 10 years (Italian legal requirement for accounting documents)
  • Support Tickets: 2 years after resolution
  • Marketing Data: Until you withdraw consent

After the retention period, we securely delete or anonymize your data.

yourRights.title: 9. Your Privacy Rights
yourRights.content:
Under GDPR (Articles 15-22) and Italian Data Protection Code, you have the following rights:

1. Right to Access (Article 15):

  • You can request a copy of all personal data we hold about you
  • We will provide this information in a commonly used electronic format
  • First request is free; additional requests may incur a reasonable fee

2. Right to Rectification (Article 16):

  • You can request correction of inaccurate or incomplete personal data
  • We will update your information promptly upon verification

3. Right to Erasure - 'Right to be Forgotten' (Article 17):

  • You can request deletion of your personal data in certain circumstances
  • Exceptions apply for legal obligations (e.g., 10-year retention for tax records)
  • We will notify third parties if we have shared your data with them

4. Right to Restriction of Processing (Article 18):

  • You can request that we limit processing of your data in certain situations
  • For example, while we verify accuracy or process your objection

5. Right to Data Portability (Article 20):

  • You can receive your personal data in a machine-readable format (JSON/CSV)
  • You can request transfer of your data to another service provider
  • Available for data processed based on consent or contract

6. Right to Object (Article 21):

  • You can object to processing based on legitimate interests
  • You can object to direct marketing at any time (including profiling)
  • We will stop processing unless we have compelling legitimate grounds

7. Right Not to be Subject to Automated Decision-Making (Article 22):

  • You have the right not to be subject to decisions based solely on automated processing
  • Note: We do not currently use automated decision-making that produces legal effects

8. Right to Withdraw Consent:

  • For processing based on consent (AI features, marketing), you can withdraw consent at any time
  • Withdrawal does not affect the lawfulness of processing before withdrawal

How to Exercise Your Rights:

  • Email us at privacy@example.com [WORK IN PROGRESS]
  • We will respond within 30 days (can be extended by 2 months if complex)
  • We may request identity verification to protect your data
  • All requests are free unless excessive or repetitive

Right to Lodge a Complaint:

  • If you believe we have violated your privacy rights, you can file a complaint with the Italian Data Protection Authority (Garante per la protezione dei dati personali)
  • Website: www.gpdp.it
  • Email: garante@gpdp.it
  • Phone: +39 06 69677 1
  • Address: Piazza Venezia 11, 00187 Roma, Italy

security.title: 10. Data Security
security.content:
We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data:

  • Encryption: HTTPS/TLS encryption for all data in transit
  • Password Protection: Bcrypt hashing for password storage
  • Access Controls: Role-based access and authentication
  • Secure Storage: Private file storage with signed URLs and time-limited access
  • Regular Backups: Automated backups with encryption
  • Monitoring: 24/7 security monitoring and logging

In the event of a data breach, we will notify you and the Italian Data Protection Authority (Garante) within 72 hours as required by law.

cookies.title: 11. Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content:
We use essential cookies to provide our services:

  • Session Cookies: To keep you logged in (30-day duration)
  • Language Preference: To remember your language choice

We do not use non-essential cookies without your consent. For more information, see our Cookie Policy.

contact.title: 12. Contact Us & Exercise Your Rights
contact.content:
To exercise your privacy rights or if you have questions:

Email: privacy@example.com [WORK IN PROGRESS]

Response Time: Within 30 days

Italian Data Protection Authority (Garante):

  • Website: www.gpdp.it
  • Email: garante@gpdp.it
  • Phone: +39 06 69677 1

You have the right to lodge a complaint with the Garante if you believe we have violated your privacy rights.

dataTypes.title: Types of Data Collected:
dataTypes.contactDesc: Email address, phone number, business address
dataTypes.technicalDesc: IP address, browser type, device information, usage patterns
dataTypes.usageDesc: How you interact with our platform, features used, preferences
dataTypes.paymentDesc: Payment card details (processed by Stripe), billing address, transaction history

database.name: Supabase PostgreSQL Database (Primary Data Storage)
database.purpose: Storing all application data including user accounts, business information, and platform content
database.location: European Union - Central Europe (Zurich, Switzerland via AWS). Switzerland has EU adequacy decision - fully GDPR compliant.
database.data: All user data, business information, service requests, appointments, support tickets, AI conversation history, payment metadata

cloudflare.name: Cloudflare R2 (File Storage)
cloudflare.purpose: Storing business images, documents, and customer uploads
cloudflare.location: European Union (can be configured for EU-only storage)
cloudflare.data: Profile images, service images, documents, contracts, signatures

stripe.name: Stripe (Payment Processing)
stripe.purpose: Processing subscription payments and managing billing
stripe.data: Payment card information, billing details, transaction records
stripe.safeguards: Protected by Standard Contractual Clauses (SCCs) and Stripe's Data Processing Agreement

openai.name: OpenAI (AI Services)
openai.purpose: Providing AI-powered chatbot and content generation
openai.data: User messages (limited to 100 characters), business context, conversation history
openai.safeguards: Protected by Standard Contractual Clauses (SCCs). Data is not used to train AI models. 30-day retention by OpenAI.

email.name: Email Service Provider (SMTP)
email.purpose: Sending transactional emails (account activation, notifications, support responses)
email.location: [WORK IN PROGRESS - Provider to be identified and verified]
email.data: Email addresses, recipient names, email content

access.title: Right to Access
access.desc: Request a copy of all personal data we hold about you

rectification.title: Right to Rectification
rectification.desc: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete data

erasure.title: Right to Erasure
erasure.desc: Request deletion of your personal data ('right to be forgotten')

portability.title: Right to Data Portability
portability.desc: Receive your data in a machine-readable format

restriction.title: Right to Restriction
restriction.desc: Request limitation of processing in certain circumstances

objection.title: Right to Object
objection.desc: Object to processing based on legitimate interests or direct marketing

supportSection.title: Questions or issues?
supportSection.description: The Quevo Team is here to help with any privacy concerns or questions about how we handle your data.

footer.compliance: This policy complies with GDPR (EU Regulation 2016/679) and Italian Data Protection Code (D.Lgs. 196/2003 as amended)

Terms.title: Terms of Service
Terms.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using our services. By accessing or using our platform, you agree to be bound by these terms.
Terms.description: These Terms of Service constitute a legally binding agreement between you and our company. Please read these terms carefully before using our services. By accessing or using our platform, you agree to be bound by these terms. If you do not agree to these terms, you may not access or use our services.

notice.title: Legal Agreement
notice.content: These Terms of Service constitute a legally binding agreement between you and our company. If you do not agree to these terms, you may not access or use our services.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content:
By creating an account or using our SaaS platform ('Service'), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service ('Terms'). If you are using the Service on behalf of an organization, you represent that you have the authority to bind that organization to these Terms.

These Terms apply to all users, including business owners, managers, and end customers who interact with your business through our platform.

definitions.title: 2. Definitions
definitions.content:
• 'Service' or 'Platform': Our SaaS business management application and all related features
  • 'User' or 'You': Any person or entity using the Service
  • 'Business Account': An account created by a business owner or manager
  • 'Customer Account': An account created by an end customer of a business
  • 'Subscription': A paid plan providing access to premium features
  • 'Content': Any data, text, images, or other materials uploaded to the Service

account.title: 3. Account Registration and Security
account.content:
Account Creation:

  • You must provide accurate and complete information when creating an account
  • You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account credentials
  • You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized access
  • You must be at least 18 years old to create a Business Account

Account Responsibilities:

  • You are responsible for all activities that occur under your account
  • You may not share your account credentials with others
  • You may not create multiple accounts to circumvent service limitations
  • You must not impersonate another person or entity

subscription.title: 4. Subscription and Billing
subscription.content:
Subscription Plans:

We offer various subscription plans with different features and pricing tiers. Current plans and pricing are available on our website. Each plan includes:

  • Access to core platform features
  • Storage limits based on plan tier
  • Number of service requests/boards
  • AI credits allocation (where applicable)
  • Customer support level

Free Trial:

  • We may offer a free trial period for new users (typically 14-30 days)
  • You may cancel before the trial ends to avoid charges
  • Credit card information may be required to start a trial
  • After the trial, you will be automatically charged unless you cancel
  • Trial limitations may apply (e.g., reduced features or usage limits)

Payment Processing:

  • All payments are processed securely through Stripe, our payment processor
  • We accept major credit and debit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express)
  • We do not store full credit card details on our servers
  • Only the last 4 digits and card brand are retained for display purposes
  • Stripe complies with PCI-DSS Level 1 requirements

Billing Cycles:

  • Subscriptions are billed monthly or annually depending on your chosen plan
  • Annual plans may offer discounted pricing
  • Billing occurs on the same day each month (or annually) from your subscription start date
  • You will receive an invoice by email after each successful payment

Automatic Renewal:

  • Subscriptions automatically renew at the end of each billing period
  • Your payment method will be charged automatically unless you cancel
  • You will receive email reminders before renewal
  • Renewal is at the then-current price (we will notify you of price changes)

Price Changes:

  • We reserve the right to modify subscription prices
  • You will be notified at least 30 days before any price increase
  • Price changes do not affect your current billing period
  • If you do not accept the new price, you may cancel your subscription

Taxes:

  • Prices are exclusive of taxes unless otherwise stated
  • You are responsible for applicable taxes (VAT, sales tax, etc.)
  • We will collect and remit taxes as required by law
  • Tax rates depend on your billing address

Failed Payments:

  • If payment fails, we will retry automatically
  • You will receive email notifications about payment issues
  • Your account may be suspended after multiple failed payment attempts
  • You will have an opportunity to update payment information

Cancellation:

  • You may cancel your subscription at any time from account settings
  • Cancellation takes effect at the end of your current billing period
  • You will retain access to paid features until the end of the billing period
  • No partial refunds for unused time within a billing period
  • You may export your data before cancellation

Refund Policy:

  • Refunds are handled in accordance with Italian Consumer Code (Codice del Consumo)
  • For EU consumers: 14-day right of withdrawal applies to online contracts
  • Annual subscriptions may be eligible for pro-rata refunds in certain circumstances
  • To request a refund, contact our support team
  • Refunds are processed to the original payment method within 14 days
  • Some fees (e.g., payment processing fees) may be non-refundable

Downgrades and Upgrades:

  • You may upgrade your plan at any time; changes take effect immediately
  • Upgrades are pro-rated for the current billing period
  • Downgrades take effect at the end of your current billing period
  • Data and features exceeding the downgraded plan limits may be restricted

usage.title: 5. Acceptable Use
usage.content:
You agree to use the Service only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms. You are responsible for all content you upload and activities you perform on the platform.

Your Responsibilities:

  • Legal Compliance: Comply with all applicable local, national, and international laws and regulations
  • Accurate Information: Provide truthful and accurate information in your profile and business listings
  • Intellectual Property: Respect copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property rights
  • Customer Privacy: Protect your customers' personal data in compliance with GDPR and privacy laws
  • Security: Maintain appropriate security measures for your account and data
  • Good Faith: Use the Service honestly and in good faith
  • Professional Conduct: Maintain professional standards in your interactions
  • Content Responsibility: Ensure all content you upload is legal, appropriate, and you have rights to use it

For Business Accounts:

  • You must have legal authorization to represent the business
  • You must ensure your use of the platform complies with your business licenses and permits
  • You are responsible for your business's compliance with consumer protection laws
  • You must maintain your own privacy policy and terms for your end customers
  • You must obtain appropriate consents from your customers for data processing

Data Protection Obligations:

  • As a business using our platform, you are an independent data controller for your customer data
  • You must comply with GDPR, Italian Data Protection Code, and other applicable privacy laws
  • You must have a lawful basis for processing customer data
  • You must obtain appropriate consents and provide privacy notices to your customers
  • You must respond to data subject requests from your customers
  • You must implement appropriate security measures

Content Standards:

  • Content must not be offensive, discriminatory, or hateful
  • Content must not be defamatory or misleading
  • Content must not violate anyone's privacy or publicity rights
  • Content must be appropriate for a business/professional context
  • Images and documents must comply with size and format requirements

prohibited.title: 6. Prohibited Activities
prohibited.content:
You must not use the Service to engage in or promote any of the following activities. Violation of these prohibitions may result in immediate account suspension or termination:

Illegal Activities:

  • Violate any local, national, or international laws or regulations
  • Engage in or facilitate fraud, money laundering, or other financial crimes
  • Sell or promote illegal goods or services
  • Engage in illegal gambling or betting activities
  • Facilitate human trafficking or exploitation

Harmful Content and Behavior:

  • Upload viruses, malware, or other malicious code
  • Attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems or other users' accounts
  • Use the Service to harass, threaten, or abuse others
  • Post content that is defamatory, libelous, or intentionally false
  • Share content that promotes violence, hatred, or discrimination
  • Share sexually explicit or inappropriate content
  • Share content that exploits or harms minors

Platform Abuse:

  • Spam users with unsolicited messages or communications
  • Create multiple accounts to circumvent restrictions or limitations
  • Manipulate or artificially inflate metrics, ratings, or reviews
  • Use automated tools or bots without authorization
  • Scrape or copy content from the Service without permission
  • Reverse engineer, decompile, or disassemble any part of the Service
  • Attempt to bypass security measures or authentication
  • Overload or disrupt our servers or networks (DoS attacks)

Intellectual Property Violations:

  • Infringe on copyrights, trademarks, patents, or other intellectual property rights
  • Upload content you do not have rights to use
  • Impersonate other businesses, brands, or individuals
  • Use our trademarks or branding without permission

Privacy Violations:

  • Collect or harvest personal data from users without authorization
  • Share others' personal information without consent (doxxing)
  • Violate GDPR or other privacy laws
  • Use data for purposes not disclosed in your privacy policy

Deceptive Practices:

  • Make false or misleading representations about your business
  • Engage in bait-and-switch tactics
  • Hide fees or terms from customers
  • Use misleading pricing or advertising
  • Create fake reviews or testimonials

AI Feature Misuse:

  • Attempt to manipulate AI responses for harmful purposes
  • Use AI features to generate spam or misleading content
  • Attempt to extract training data or reverse engineer AI models
  • Use AI to impersonate real people without disclosure

Payment and Financial Violations:

  • Use stolen credit cards or payment information
  • Engage in chargeback fraud
  • Attempt to evade or manipulate billing
  • Use the Service for Ponzi schemes or pyramid schemes

Consequences of Violations:

  • We reserve the right to investigate suspected violations
  • Violations may result in warning, suspension, or permanent termination
  • Serious violations may be reported to law enforcement
  • You may be held liable for damages resulting from violations
  • Refunds may be withheld in cases of Terms violations

intellectualProperty.title: 7. Intellectual Property Rights
intellectualProperty.content:
Our Rights:

  • The Service, including its software, design, and content, is owned by us and protected by intellectual property laws
  • You may not copy, modify, distribute, or reverse-engineer any part of the Service
  • Our trademarks and logos may not be used without written permission

Your Content:

  • You retain ownership of content you upload to the Service
  • You grant us a license to store, process, and display your content to provide the Service
  • You are responsible for ensuring you have rights to all content you upload
  • You may export and delete your content at any time

liability.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
liability.content:
Service Availability:

  • We strive to provide 99.9% uptime but do not guarantee uninterrupted service
  • We are not liable for service interruptions or data loss
  • You are responsible for maintaining backups of your important data

Disclaimer:

THE SERVICE IS PROVIDED 'AS IS' WITHOUT WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND. [WORK IN PROGRESS - Legal review required for liability limitations under Italian law]

Maximum Liability:

[WORK IN PROGRESS - To be defined based on subscription plan and Italian Consumer Code requirements]

termination.title: 9. Termination
termination.content:
Termination by You:

  • You may cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings
  • Cancellation takes effect at the end of your current billing period
  • You will retain access until the end of the paid period
  • You may export your data before termination

Termination by Us:

  • We may suspend or terminate your account for violation of these Terms
  • We may terminate accounts for non-payment
  • We will provide notice before termination when possible
  • In case of serious violations, we may terminate immediately

Effect of Termination:

  • You will lose access to the Service and your data
  • We will retain data as required by law (e.g., 10 years for accounting records)
  • Other data will be deleted according to our Privacy Policy

changes.title: 10. Changes to Terms
changes.content:
We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time:

  • We will notify you of material changes via email or platform notification
  • Changes take effect 30 days after notification
  • Continued use of the Service after changes constitutes acceptance
  • If you do not agree to changes, you may cancel your subscription

governingLaw.title: 11. Governing Law and Jurisdiction
governingLaw.content:
Applicable Law:

These Terms are governed by Italian law and EU regulations. [WORK IN PROGRESS - Specific jurisdiction to be defined]

Dispute Resolution:

  • We encourage resolving disputes through good-faith negotiation
  • For B2C disputes: Italian courts have jurisdiction, and you may use EU Online Dispute Resolution platform
  • For B2B disputes: [WORK IN PROGRESS - Arbitration clause to be defined]

Consumer Rights:

Nothing in these Terms affects your statutory rights under Italian Consumer Code (Codice del Consumo) or EU consumer protection laws.

contact.title: 12. Contact Information
contact.content:
For questions about these Terms:

Email: legal@example.com [WORK IN PROGRESS]

Address: [WORK IN PROGRESS]

Support: Contact Support

prohibited.item4: Spam, harass, or abuse other users
prohibited.item5: Attempt to gain unauthorized access to the Service
prohibited.item6: Use the Service for illegal activities (fraud, money laundering, etc.)

payment.title: Payment Processing
payment.desc: Payments are processed securely by Stripe. We do not store your full credit card details.

renewal.title: Automatic Renewal
renewal.desc: Subscriptions automatically renew at the end of each billing period unless cancelled.

cancellation.title: Cancellation Policy
cancellation.desc: You may cancel anytime. Cancellation takes effect at the end of the current billing period.

refunds.title: Refund Policy
refunds.desc: Refunds are processed in accordance with Italian Consumer Code. Contact support for refund requests.

warning.title: Data Retention After Termination
warning.desc: After account termination, we retain data as legally required (e.g., 10 years for tax records). Other data is deleted according to our retention policy outlined in our Privacy Policy.

supportSection.title: Questions or issues?
supportSection.description: The Quevo Team is here to help with any legal or compliance questions about our Terms of Service.

footer.compliance: These terms comply with Italian law and EU regulations including the Consumer Rights Directive
